title: Legislative challenge in UK and Mexico

content.prompt: Which of the following describes a political challenge common to legislatures in both the United Kingdom and Mexico?

choices.label: Both countries have bicameral legislatures with equal powers.
Both countries have one strong chamber and one powerless chamber.
Both countries have legislatures with multiple competing parties.
Both countries have legislatures that select the executive.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
